cab.content:
Colonel Jones (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT).
SECRET.
WAR CABINET.
G.T. 3688.
FORESTRY ADMINISTRATION.
Memorandum drawn up for the War Cabinet by Lord Lovat and Others.
(G.T. 3319).
I am asked by Lord Lovat to add the name of the Marquess of Headfort, President of the Irish Forestry Society, as signatory of the above Memorandum on Forestry Administration.
M.P.A. HANKEY.
Secretary.
2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.1.
22nd, February, 1918.
